elements.description: Plays the specified animation on a Spine model. A [ref:spine_animation_done] message is sent to the callback (or message handler). Any spine events will also be handled in the same way. [icon:attention] The callback is not called (or message sent) if the animation is cancelled with [ref:spine.cancel]. The callback is called (or message sent) only for animations that play with the following playback modes * `go.PLAYBACK_ONCE_FORWARD` * `go.PLAYBACK_ONCE_BACKWARD` * `go.PLAYBACK_ONCE_PINGPONG`
elements.name: play_anim

parameters.doc: The Spine model for which to play an animation
parameters.name: url

parameters.doc: Id of the animation to play
parameters.name: anim_id

parameters.doc: Playback mode of the animation (from go.PLAYBACK_*)
parameters.name: playback

parameters.doc: Playback options
parameters.name: options

parameters.doc: Duration of a linear blend between the current and new animation.
parameters.name: blend_duration

parameters.doc: The normalized initial value of the animation cursor when the animation starts playing.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.doc: The rate with which the animation will be played. Must be positive.
parameters.name: playback_rate

parameters.doc: The track index of the animation. Defaults to 1. Animations on different tracks play in parallel.
parameters.name: track

parameters.doc: function to call when the animation has completed or a Spine event occured
parameters.name: callback_function

parameters.doc: The context of the calling script
parameters.name: self

parameters.doc: The name of the message ("spine_animation_done" or "spine_event")
parameters.name: message_id

parameters.doc: A table that contains the response
parameters.name: message

parameters.doc: The animation that was completed
parameters.name: animation_id

parameters.doc: The track index of the animation
parameters.name: track

parameters.doc: (spine_animation_done only!) The playback mode for the animation
parameters.name: playback

parameters.doc: (spine_event only!) the event that was triggered.
parameters.name: event_id

parameters.doc: (spine_event only!) the time at which the event occurred (seconds)
parameters.name: t

parameters.doc: (spine_event only!) a custom integer associated with the event (0 by default).
parameters.name: integer

parameters.doc: (spine_event only!) a custom float associated with the event (0 by default)
parameters.name: float

parameters.doc: (spine_event only!) a custom string associated with the event (hash("") by default)
parameters.name: string

parameters.doc: The invoker of the callback - the Spine model component
parameters.name: sender

elements.description: Cancels all running animations on a specified spine model component
elements.name: cancel

parameters.doc: The Spine model for which to cancel the animation
parameters.name: url

parameters.doc: Cancel options
parameters.name: options

parameters.doc: The index of the track which to cancel the animation on. Defaults to all animations on all tracks.
parameters.name: track

elements.description: Returns the id of the game object that corresponds to a specified skeleton bone.
elements.name: get_go

parameters.doc: The Spine model to query
parameters.name: url

parameters.doc: Id of the corresponding bone
parameters.name: bone_id

elements.description: Returns the id of the game object that corresponds to a specified skeleton bone.
elements.name: set_skin

parameters.doc: The Spine model to query
parameters.name: url

parameters.doc: Id of the corresponding skin
parameters.name: skin

elements.description: Set the attachment of a lot on a spine model.
elements.name: set_attachment

parameters.doc: The Spine model to query
parameters.name: url

parameters.doc: Id of the slot
parameters.name: slot

parameters.doc: Id of the attachment
parameters.name: attachment

elements.description: Resets a shader constant for a spine model component. (Previously set with `go.set()`)
elements.name: reset_constant

parameters.doc: The Spine model to query
parameters.name: url

parameters.doc: name of the constant
parameters.name: constant

info.description: Functions and constants for interacting with Spine models
info.name: spine
